Posts.Content: Hello recently diagnosed with prostate cancer 3 + 4 gleeson PSA 4.5 - no symptoms so a bit of a shock, 57 yrs age, MRi confirms no spread outside the prostate, surgeon wants to remove, not keen on side effects - so looking at options. does anyone have experience with hyperthermia - either local or whole body in Germnay or elsewhere?? appreciate any comments / advice.
Posts.Title: Hyperthermia ????
